document.full_text: world number one rafa nadal began his quest for a third clay title in less than a month with a 6-1 6-3 drubbing of unseeded cypriot marcos baghdatis in the madrid open second round on wednesday.
document.title: nadal thumps baghdatis, djokovic stays unbeaten
lines_and_colors: world number one rafa nadal began his quest for a third clay title in less than a month with a 6-1 6-3 drubbing of unseeded cypriot marcos baghdatis in the madrid open second round on wednesday.
